<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An unterminated open brace is undefined. Assert to indicate that this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undefined and that we consider it an error. When asserts are disabled,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform additional validation. Verify that the number of arguments matches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of replacement indices and that there are no holes in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When validation fails, return an array of replacement items that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// validation is enabled in release mode).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getErrorReplacements = &#91;SavedFmtStr&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> ErrorMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replacementitem">ReplacementItem</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid formatv() call: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replacementitem">ReplacementItem</a>(ErrorMsg),</span></CodeLine>
